summary: Get inside the storied world of the Christian Dior fashion house with a privileged, behind-the-scenes look at the creation of Raf Simons' first haute couture collection as its new artistic director.
cast: Christian Dior|Omar Berrada|Raf Simons|Pieter Mulier|Cathy Horyn|Florence Chehet|Monique Bailly|Bernard Arnault|Catherine Rivière|Sidney Toledano|Li Hong Bo|Fulvio Rigoni|Nadine Prot|Olivier Bialobos|Esther Heesch|Julia Nobis|Vlada Roslyakova|Grace Coddington|Marion Cotillard|Isabelle Huppert|Marc Jacobs|Jennifer Lawrence|Sharon Stone|Donatella Versace|Harvey Weinstein|Anna Wintour
keywords: monogram|new hire|introduction|some scenes in black and white|archival footage
title: Dior y yo
